name: Edward N. KURLAND, Esq., Executor of the Estate of Allen Cohen, etc. v. Leonard STOLKER, Individually and t/a Lombard Mews Co., etc., Petitioner

opinions.text: Petition for Allowance of Appeal GRANTED, No. 135 E.D. Appeal Docket 1986.
